content.text:
# List of airlines of the Republic of the Congo

This is a list of airlines currently operating in the Republic of the Congo. All of the currently operating airlines are banned from operating in the EU.

|- valign="middle"
! Airline
! IATA
! ICAO
! Callsign
! Image
|-

|-
| Trans Air Congo || Q8 || TSG || TRANS-CONGO ||
|-
| Equatorial Congo Airlines || EJ || EQR || ECAIR ||
|}
